name: Wood Castle

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at Wood Castle for 1 day.
reviews.title: Fantastic Value, Great Staff
Very friendly and helpfull staff
reviews.text: Our pre-paid taxi driver had issues locating this place, as this is located on a small by-lane. Guests should ideally have a print of the location map which is on Wood Castle's website.
The room was basic but clean and the bed was very comfortable.
reviews.title: India would not be the same without Wood Castle!

reviews.text: The best part of Wood Castle is the management and staff. They make you feel welcomed and are extremely helpful. One of the managers personally explained the nearby attractions and helped us understand how to get to the nearby Metro station.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: The attitude of the management was highlighted when we actually left the place. We had to take a domestic flight and the driver took us to the airport. On reaching the airport, we understood that the airline had shifted operations to the new terminal from that very day. The new terminal was some distance from the old airport. The manager not just instructed the driver to take us to the new terminal at no extra cost, but also reassured us that he will be available on phone in case of any issues.
reviews.title: Comfortable and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is on a small side street and was being renovated when we stayed, so the pictures don’t really do this place justice. The rooms are so much nicer than in the photos on TA! The staff are very friendly and even gave me a free beer whilst we waited for our room to be ready.
reviews.title: Rooms have been modernised!

reviews.text: I travelled to Delhi with my two sons (aged 19 and 22) and we stayed here two nights early in our trip and another two nights after returning to Delhi from a tour of Jaipur, Ranthambore and Agra. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful, the room was clean and quite comfortable and it had a full en-suite bathroom with western toilet. They have a restaurant which offers a reasonable selection of Indian dishes but the dining room has only two tables so you can't always eat when you might want to. They have a single computer with internet access available for guests to use which is connected to a printer if you need it. If you decide to stay there I strongly suggest that you accept the hotel offer of a car to collect you, since it is not easy to find even for residents of New Delhi. I also suggest that you accept that this is more of a homestay or a B&B than a hotel. However, we had the option of going elsewhere for our second stay in Delhi but opted to return to the Wood Castle.
reviews.title: Clean B&B with helpful and friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Wood Castle for 3nights as part of a 2week trip. We chose this hotel following on from reading all of the excellent reviews.
reviews.title: Highly recommend Wood Castle

reviews.text: Initially we were a little shocked when we arrived as the street the hotel is on isn't that nice, but when you get in to the hotel it acts as a little oasis from the hectic life that you find in Delhi.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: The staff are marvellous, friendly, helpful - make sure you speak to them before you book any taxi's etc, and they'll probably get you much better prices than you would find elsewhere.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel...Friendly Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1st time in New Delhi, stayed for 3 nights at the Wood Castle, the owner and staff could not have been more helpful, what ever help you needed they gave. The rooms are spotless, cleaned every day, clean towels, food lovely, feels like home from home.
reviews.title: would highly recommend

reviews.text: would recommend to anyone
reviews.title: Will talk about Wood Castle for years to come

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wood Castle really was one of the best experiences on my travel to India. The staff once you entered, was sitting in more of a living room than a hotel lobby, and talked to you like your family and distant relatives that you haven't seen in ages. Though we were in Delhi for only one evening, I had wanted to briefly see the India Gate, and was arranging to see it by cab.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay, The staff could not have done more for us!

reviews.text: The kind and hospitable owner, took an interest in us and decided to personally take us himself along with another friendly traveller/guest for a night sightseeing tour of India. Tell me, where in the world would you find that kind of service and hospitality?? It really made my visit to Delhi a very happy one. The comments are correct, Wood Castle is not a hotel, it is your second home in Delhi, India, and i would love to return back to it one day.
reviews.title: the best hotel for budget travellers

reviews.text: Arriving in Delhi after a long flight this place was the perfect remedy, a lovely clean hotel with fantastic staff, we were given complimentary drinks on arrival and the staff made us feel most welcome.
reviews.title: Kind of like visiting relatives

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wood Castle seems more like a high-end hostel than a hotel. It's in a sketchy part of Delhi. That being said, the accommodations are clean and breakfast is free. The service is decent. It's a good value.
reviews.title: More like a High-End Hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I needed an hotel for 2 nights in Dehli and i knew that i could get a nice one if i paid a lot of money, but i would only really be sleeping at the hotel as i would be late back at the hotel on both evenings. This hotel seemed perfect on price and based on the reviews that i had read. It turned out tobe excellent and the people at the hotel were friendly and polite. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the meals that we had were very good. The location isnt the best but from what i could i see, there's worse elsewhere....this is India. After a busy day you can easily unwind in this hotel and it was nice to chat not to the manager but also to other people staying there. Will use again if i stay in Dehli again.
reviews.title: excellent stay and will use again

reviews.text: I had been to Wood Castle on 24, 25 Dec 2010 and it was a lovely stay. Its a very clean & quiet Hotel and clean Rooms. Very professionally managed but still you feel at home thanks the wonderful hospitality shown by the Team.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel with great Hospitality

reviews.text: On the Eve of 25th Dec Mr. Rajesh was actually Santa in green clothes :) with lots of Food, drinks, cakes, Chocolates and balloons for kids and the party was small but splendid. The food quality is also awesome.
reviews.title: Lovely place with fantastic staff!
Wonderful hotel & staff!
reviews.text: Mr CP Singh , Santosh are also very very helpful people. Just FYI I was stranded on Delhi airport on 26th night and I simply called at Hotel for Room but unluckily they didn't have room but what they did was a thing to remember. They arranged for a Room in nearby place and and when i reached there by Taxi i wasn't able to locate the place but Santosh came out in night at 7degrees and guided us the right place and made sure we had right accommodation.

description: We are in the area of karol bagh in new delhi,Karol bagh is the centerally located i.e. heart of delhi. karol bagh is 16km from international airport, 12km froom domestic airport & 3km from new delhi railway station.We are quality focused,great in service,one of the three star amenities rooms.We have super deluxe rooms with EUROPEAN styles,with contemporary comforts to create a luxurious ambience.
